text: Caucasorhynchia is an extinct genus of brachiopods in the family Allorhynchidae. Species are known from the Triassic of Europe, Russia and the United States. == See also == * List of brachiopod genera == References == == External links == * * Category:Prehistoric brachiopod genera Category:Triassic brachiopods Category:Rhynchonellida
title: Caucasorhynchia
